name: Swami Vivekanand Shiksha & Samaj Kalyan Samiti
briefDescription: Enhancing livelihood situation to small farmers in flood affected areas of district Siddharth Nagar (UP)- 1000 small farmers have adopted organic farming, cash crops, vegetable & fruit nursery by kitchen garden, goatery, poultry farm, candle industry. 1000 female SHGs have been farmed and linked with Banks. 450 targeted people e.g. female sex worker, man sex with man and drug users behaviour have been changed and awared about HIV/AIDS & STI diseases. Village Development Program is being implementing in two remote villages of district Sant Kabir Nagar for integrated development of villages. 2000 female youths are vocationally trained for Cutting tailoring, Beautician, Box making, Zari zardogi, Candle making, Soft toys, Painting
